title: Is Publisher Rocket the Best Tool for Self Publishers?

tactics.name: Keyword Research
tactics.description: Identify profitable keywords using Publisher Rocket's metrics to assess competition and demand
steps: Analyze metrics like average pages, competitors count, and monthly earnings
Filter keywords based on competitive score and search volume
caveats: Amazon's competitor reporting limit affects competition scores
source_quotes: Publisher Rocket is grabbing the info straight from Amazon

tactics.name: Competitor Analysis
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to gather competitor data including BSR rank, page count, price, and categories
steps: Search keywords like 'activity book for kids'
source_quotes: ...price of the book The Daily sales...

tactics.name: Category Optimization
tactics.description: Identify profitable Amazon categories using Publisher Rocket's category search feature
steps: Prioritize categories with high sales-to-number-10 metrics
source_quotes: ...sales to number 10 is the same thing...

tactics.name: Category Sales Threshold Analysis
tactics.description: Identify categories with lower sales requirements for bestseller badges using Publisher Rocket's category insights
steps: Check daily sales thresholds for bestseller badges
Compare sales fluctuations and competition levels
caveats: Categories with high variation may have unpredictable growth
source_quotes: you only need one sale per day to get the best sellers badge

tactics.name: Keyword Research for Listing Optimization
tactics.description: Generate targeted keywords for Amazon listings using Publisher Rocket's keyword insights
steps: Access keyword suggestions for niche categories
Export keyword lists for bulk listing
caveats: Requires paid membership for full keyword access
source_quotes: this list is something that you can take advantage of

heuristics.name: Competitive Score Filter
heuristics.condition: If competitive score is below 50, prioritize the keyword
source_quotes: competitive score of 89 saying that it's very competitive

heuristics.name: New Book Opportunity
heuristics.condition: If book age is less than 1 year and BSR < 50,000, then flag as potential opportunity

heuristics.name: Low Review Niche Targeting
heuristics.condition: If median_reviews is less than 200, prioritize niches with high profit potential
source_quotes: this category has high profit in the top ranking books

claims.statement: Amazon limits competitor reporting to 1,200 entries
source_quotes: Amazon is limiting the number reported to a Max of 1,200

claims.statement: Ghost categories on Amazon use parent categories for ranking
source_quotes: ...Amazon is going to use this parent category...

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket is a one-time purchase tool with no monthly subscription
source_quotes: you only have to pay one time and you never pay again

niche_patterns.description: Target specific audience segments with tailored content
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Narrower niches reduce competition and increase search specificity
source_quotes: fun activity books for kids ages 5 to 7
